$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-ta.title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-table
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-ta.tbl-columns: tbl-checkbox tbl-expand-many title tags status priority tbl-button tbl-delete
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-ta.tbl-caption:
__''Project: ''<$text text=<>/>__
''Tags: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter tags..." tiddler=<> field="tags" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
''Description: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter description..." tiddler=<> field="description" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
<$edit-text tag=textarea placeholder="Enter project notes..." tiddler=<> field="text" class="tbl-hidden-edit-wide"/>''Tasks assigned to <$text text=<>/>'' | //<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"><$action-setfield $tiddler="Task" link=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param="Task"/>''new task {{$:/core/images/new-button}}''//
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-ta.tbl-anything:
<$select tiddler=<<currentRecord>> field="status" default="">
<option value=''>Select...</option>
<option value='open'>open</option>
<option value='not started'>not started</option>
<option value='in-work'>in-work</option>
<option value='on-hold'>on-hold</option>
<option value='complete'>complete</option>
<option value='rework'>rework</option>
<option value='closed'>closed</option>
</$select>

$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project.title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project-table
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project.tbl-columns: tbl-expand-one title tags status priority tbl-button
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project.tbl-caption:
__''Realm: ''<$text text=<>/>__
''Tags: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter tags..." tiddler=<> field="tags" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
''Description: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter description..." tiddler=<> field="description" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
''<$text text=<>/> Projects'' | //<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"><$action-setfield $tiddler="Project" link=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param="Project"/>''new project {{$:/core/images/new-button}}''//
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project.tbl-anything:
<$select tiddler=<<currentRecord>> field="status" default="">
<option value=''>Select...</option>
<option value='open'>open</option>
<option value='not started'>not started</option>
<option value='in-work'>in-work</option>
<option value='on-hold'>on-hold</option>
<option value='complete'>complete</option>
<option value='rework'>rework</option>
<option value='closed'>closed</option>
</$select>

$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/readme.text:
*required: 

**~TiddlyTables plugin

**add //priority// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit

**add //status// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything

**click here to patch automatically: <$button>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything" $field="tbl-column-list" $subfilter="status"/>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit" $field="tbl-column-list" $subfilter="priority"/>
Fix Templates</$button>
$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/readme.title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/readme
